title: How long on a ticket?
body: So last week, for whatever reason, I couldn't log on. I was getting invalid username/password. So I opened a ticket, answered what questions I could, and filled it out like they said to do for account recovery. This was Friday or Saturday. They sent me an email to check the ticket but in order to check the ticket you have to log in, which I can't do. How long does it typically take to respond to a ticket? I'm not complaining about the time, I'm patient. I just want to know about how long before I make another request or whatever the next step would be. Thanks

replies.body:
There's no estimated time, as it really varies depending on what's going on in League at the time and how many tickets we've had submitted recently. I know that at the moment there's a bit of a delay due to a large volume of tickets we've had lately. Our teams are working their butts off to get to everyone as soon as possible, so if you sit tight, we'll get to you soon.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
